channel.title: Plexiglass on It's Airborne.
channel.description: Recent content in Plexiglass on It's Airborne.

item.title: Mitigating Short Range Transmission
item.description: You are standing in front of a smoker, how to do you avoid inhaling the smoke?

item.title: When Plexiglass Is Useful And When It Isn't
item.description: Plexiglass can be useful in specific situations, but harmful in others. To know why, you need to know the different methods of airborne transmission.
